name: Hide header - Mozilla Developer Network
description:
Lose nothing on the page but a little clutter:
(1) Header and footer are reduced to thin horizontal strips at the top and bottom of the screen - they expand again when you mouse over them.
<s>(2) Right sidebar ("Table of Contents") is moved to the left side of the screen and reduced to a thin vertical strip - it expands again when you mouse over it.</s>
That's it - the Mozilla website is pretty clean as-is.

style_setting_options.label: Bottom of the screen (always in sight and available)
Bottom of the page (scrolls with the page out of view)
